problems.title: 3D Array Sum
problems.description: Calculate the sum of all elements in a 3D array.
problems.inputFormat: First line: x y z (dimensions)\nNext x*y lines: z space-separated integers (grouped by x layers)

problems.title: Layer Sum
problems.description: Calculate and print the sum of each layer (x-dimension) separately.
problems.inputFormat: First line: x y z (dimensions)\nNext x*y lines: z space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print x lines, each with sum of that layer

problems.title: Find Maximum in 3D Array
problems.description: Find and print the maximum element in a 3D array.
problems.inputFormat: First line: x y z (dimensions)\nNext x*y lines: z space-separated integers

problems.title: Search Element in 3D Array
problems.description: Search for an element in 3D array. Print 'i j k' if found, else '-1 -1 -1'.
problems.inputFormat: First line: x y z (dimensions)\nNext x*y lines: z space-separated integers\nLast line: target element
problems.outputFormat: Print 'i j k' (0-indexed) if found, else '-1 -1 -1'

problems.title: Count Positive Elements in 3D
problems.description: Count how many positive elements (>0) are in the 3D array.
problems.inputFormat: First line: x y z (dimensions)\nNext x*y lines: z space-separated integers

problems.title: Row Sum in Each Layer
problems.description: For each layer, print the sum of each row.
problems.inputFormat: First line: x y z (dimensions)\nNext x*y lines: z space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print x*y lines, each with row sum

problems.title: Column Sum Across Layers
problems.description: Calculate sum of each column (z-dimension) across all layers.
problems.inputFormat: First line: x y z (dimensions)\nNext x*y lines: z space-separated integers

problems.title: Average of Each Layer
problems.description: Calculate average of each layer (integer division).
problems.inputFormat: First line: x y z (dimensions)\nNext x*y lines: z space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print x lines, each with average of that layer

problems.title: Count Zeros in 3D Array
problems.description: Count how many zero elements are in the 3D array.
problems.inputFormat: First line: x y z (dimensions)\nNext x*y lines: z space-separated integers

problems.title: First and Last Element
problems.description: Print the first element (0,0,0) and last element (x-1,y-1,z-1) of the 3D array.
problems.inputFormat: First line: x y z (dimensions)\nNext x*y lines: z space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print first and last element space-separated

sampleTestCases.explanation: First element is 1, last element is 8

problems.title: Diagonal Sum Across Layers
problems.description: Calculate sum of main diagonal elements across all layers (where i=j for each layer).
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (cube size, n×n×n)\nNext n*n lines: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Layer-wise Maximum
problems.description: Find and print the maximum element in each layer.
problems.inputFormat: First line: x y z (dimensions)\nNext x*y lines: z space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print x lines, each with maximum of that layer

sampleTestCases.explanation: Layer 0 max: 5, Layer 1 max: 8, Layer 2 max: 9

problems.title: Transpose Each Layer
problems.description: Transpose each layer (swap rows and columns) and print the result.
problems.inputFormat: First line: x n (layers and square size)\nNext x*n lines: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print transposed 3D array (x*n lines with n integers)

problems.title: 3D Space Diagonal Sum
problems.description: Calculate sum of 3D space diagonal (where i=j=k) in a cube.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (cube size)\nNext n*n lines: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Count Elements Greater Than Average
problems.description: Count how many elements are greater than the average of all elements.
problems.inputFormat: First line: x y z (dimensions)\nNext x*y lines: z space-separated integers

problems.title: Flatten and Sort
problems.description: Flatten the 3D array to 1D, sort it, and print.
problems.inputFormat: First line: x y z (dimensions)\nNext x*y lines: z space-separated integers

sampleTestCases.explanation: All elements sorted in ascending order

problems.title: Mirror Layers
problems.description: Reverse the order of layers (first layer becomes last, etc.) and print.
problems.inputFormat: First line: x y z (dimensions)\nNext x*y lines: z space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print mirrored array (x*y lines with z integers)

problems.title: 3D Prefix Sum Queries
problems.description: Build 3D prefix sum array. Answer q queries for sum of cuboid from (0,0,0) to (i,j,k).
problems.inputFormat: First line: x y z q (dimensions and queries)\nNext x*y lines: z integers\nNext q lines: i j k (query coordinates)
problems.outputFormat: Print q lines, each with cuboid sum

problems.title: Shortest Path in 3D Grid
problems.description: Find shortest path from (0,0,0) to (x-1,y-1,z-1) in 3D grid. 0=passable, 1=blocked. Can move 6 directions. Print length or -1.
problems.inputFormat: First line: x y z (dimensions)\nNext x*y lines: z space-separated 0s and 1s

problems.title: 3D Connected Components
problems.description: Count number of connected components in 3D binary array. 1s connected via 6-directional adjacency form components.
problems.inputFormat: First line: x y z (dimensions)\nNext x*y lines: z space-separated 0s and 1s
